alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 10:11PM EDT until April 02 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Water levels will slowly continue to rise on the Patoka River near Princeton, reaching minor flood stage Wednesday afternoon. The river will crest near 18.8 feet Friday night. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon to a crest of 18.8 feet Friday night. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
